scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE From: <sip:BobApp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Contact: <sip:BobApp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> X-DolbyVoice-Client-LogId: nomedia.xml Session-Expires: 90;refresher=uas Supported: timer Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 1520362725252 1520362725252 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- t=0 0
